content.text: Audrey Arroyo, better known by her stage name Audrey Bitoni, was born and raised in Pasadena, California.

Bitoni doesn't seem to have a religious bone in her body–I know, bad joke. But seriously, I couldn't find any indication that she's even remotely religious. Her career as a porn star would make me assume she's not a devout believer in any religious dogma, barring any evidence to the contrary.

content.sourceTitle: Audrey Bitoni famous celebrity pornstar profile.
content.text: She is of German and Spanish descent,
so chances are there was some Catholic, or some other type of Christian influence on her family tree. But that is all we have. All of it.

Because, normally we would have something to say about her politics right here. But again there's nothing. Her career would make me assume that she's not particularly conservative, although she could certainly be libertarian. But it would also fit if she was a liberal, first amendment crusader.

content.sourceTitle: Audrey Bitoni famous celebrity pornstar profile.
content.text: But she's also the only porn star I've ever heard of who's never had an orgasm,
so she could be secretly a hard-core conservative Republican for all we know.
If any of you dedicated porn fans out there have any more information, we'd love to hear from you in the comments.
